website_summaries.verdict: A mid-calf style that is praised for wearing well and being stylish; tends to run on the small side.
pros: Known for being a great everyday boot, this style is easy to put on and take off, is comfortable, and praised for being stylish and warm
It also gets top marks for fit, and customers appreciated the rubber soles
cons: A few felt this style wasn't long-lasting enough, and they run on the small side
Waterproofing is needed if worn in less-than-dry weather

customer_reviews.title: Entire Sole Came Off After 15-20 Wears
customer_reviews.text: Cute for 1 month. We received them mid-October. It's end of November. My daughter's wore them probably 15-20 times and they're 100% BROKEN. I'm so mad and wish I could return them. They were adorable until the entire sole fell off. My daughter is 8 and plays pretty hard. The shoe fit perfectly and she loved the style and comfort of them, but they didn't hold up to a busy bee child. I think boots like these should be able to be worn more than a month without breaking. I don't normally provide bad reviews, but I'll be looking for another brand when I buy my daughters boots from now on. :(
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsinite

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these boots and finds them very comfortable! I am a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots and finds them very comfortable! I am a little disappointed, however, in how these boots are wearing. We got the same pair last year, only in gray, and they held up very well. These have a lot of white fuzziness, especially around the toe area. They look dirty, but aren't.
customer_reviews.author: MommytoKCE

customer_reviews.title: They will ruin any leggings /tights you wear with them
customer_reviews.text: Reallly disappointed with this purchase They have ruined every pair of leggings or tights that my daughter wears with them, they snag and make pimples on the leggings/tights! I missed the return window but do wish the seller would resolve this problem . The fur inside the boot is hard and feels funny around the leg area exactly wfere they damage the leggings. I wouldn’t recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Nom

customer_reviews.title: They bleed!
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute but on the first day my daughter wore them we had an unexpected wet snow. She came home with purple pants as the boots bled all over her clothes when she knelt down at recess. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit/quality as always
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these boots for the last 5 years for the kids and have always been satisfied. While the don't carry the Ugg cache', we were not willing to spend the added cost for the name only. These boots have fit well and can last the entire cold season (about 5 months in Chicago). Definitely recommend spraying with a suede/nubuck protector (like Scott's brand) to protect from rain/snow/salt etc,
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Usually we get 1 winter out BearPaws, but with ...
customer_reviews.text: Usually we get 1 winter out BearPaws, but with this pair, we only got 2 weeks before the seam split on the toe!
customer_reviews.author: RuFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasts my daughter for at least 2 winters! Trust me, they will outgrow them before they wear the material out. Great if you have multiple kids and need a boot for "hand-me-down". My daughters love all the different colors to choose from. I love that my money is well spent! Colors and sizes are true to advertisement. I do recommend going up a half size just because the inside has fleece lining plus your kids socks will take up a little room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sole ripped after only 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this item. My daughter has worn bear paw boots for several years and this pair of boots only held up three weeks and we are not even into the snow season. The sole started coming away from the bottom of the shoe. So after wearing them maybe 15 times in normal conditions they are needing to be thrown away ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have boots for warm feet in the winter
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old daughter loves them. They fit tight at first, but you want them to, as they soon fit great after they're worn a couple times. Both my daughter's have a pair, even mom does. A must have for the winter collection, for not only fashion but warmth!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality solid boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9 yo and was worried about the quality but rest assured I was happy to find out it was a solid purchase. She has been wearing them for 2 months (heavy user) and they are keeping up with her older sisters Ugg’s. Will gladly but agin !
customer_reviews.author: Derik Fritsch

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my previous review. Take note that these boots do not have any waterproofing at all. My daughter and I went trick or treating the other night and trudged through some wet grass. She wore her Bearpaws and I wore my Uggs. Within a half hour her boots were completely soaked through and her feet were freezing. Mine showed wetness on the leather but the inside was completely dry. If her boots ever dry (two days later they are still wet), I may try treating them. Will not be letting her wear these in the winter, though... Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Daughters boot for the season!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable warm boot ever! They compare to the UGG, are great quality and at a much better price. I got these for my daughter at a local store, she couldn't get them off her feet. I ordered them here for my sencond daughter n they arrived just 3 days later (wasn't prime). So happy! So far they look great, are really comfy and fit. They of course shouldn't be worn if rain or snow. It is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved these. But the front sole came off with in a month of purchase. I am going to purchase uggs and hopefully they will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my 9 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She started wearing them 2 weeks ago, and they are already falling apart (see photo). Return window is closed but the seller should refund my money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Defective boot?
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on top of boot came apart within two hours of wearing them for the first time. We have purchased Bearpaw boots many times before from other locations, hoping the seller is willing to replace the defective boot. Waiting to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: J Fishback

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy boots for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Bearpaw boots for my daughters and they love them. May not be as durable as more expensive brands but given how quickly kids grow the price is right and just when they are starting to look pretty beat up, they don’t fit anymore anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Monkeychick

customer_reviews.title: I feel like these should last me for more than just a ...
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves these boots. Unfortunately, only after a few months of wearing, the bottom of one of the boot completely came apart. I feel like these should last me for more than just a few months since they are not particularly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ku

customer_reviews.title: Super fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: We exchanged for a bigger size. Daughter almost didn’t let me, because they are so fuzzy and cozy. They do bleed when wet but that hasn’t caused an issue for us yet.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots, perfect for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size up and they fit my 4 year old son great he absolutely loves them , they are very well made and Seem sturdy, I’ve only had them about a month but so far so good !
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the soles of the boots began to come apart a few months after getting these. Adorable, but they didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: 4Ships

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 pair of these for our girls on Christmas. I was not ready to spend over 100$ on Uggs (especially with little girls) but I did want something of quality. These shoes were surprisingly heavy duty, very comfortable and looks as if they will last. I will definitely use this brand again for myself and in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these boots!! Well made and easy for our 5yo to put on by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. I bought them last year for my granddaughter and she loved them. She really wanted the grey ones so I had to return these chocolate ones which were really nice looking.

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw  boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8 yr old daughter. She loves them and pretty much wears them everywhere. Seem very durable and she says they fit good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Cozy durable kids boot
customer_reviews.text: The first pair we ordered were a little snug so I had to reorder and size up for my daughter. Overall great quality. Good alternative to Ugg’s
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Crow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!! My 8 year old daughter loves them. She's a bit clumsy amd has lots of spills so I went with the dark boot. Dark but still a pop of color. I sprayed them with stain repellent and they are holding up. They are good quality and durable but most importantly, warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rosabelle

customer_reviews.title: Both ripped out on both sides within 45 days of wearing
customer_reviews.text: I thought Bear Paw was supposed to be a good brand, and unfortunately, I have to buy them again for my very sad daughter. She wore these from November through mid December, NOT in snow or anything the the soles of both boots ripped open and they are unwearable. I'm so mad that I have to buy these again, but I refuse to pay for the more expensive brand, and she deserves better than wal mart shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ESL

customer_reviews.title: nice exterior shape
customer_reviews.text: Why buy Uggs when you can buy these? Fully lined with wool, nice exterior shape. My daughter puts them on as soon as she gets home (it's not cold yet). Love.
customer_reviews.author: B.D. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots, but they run small!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! They look and feel just like Uggs. My daughter always wears an 11.5 in all shoes/boots, but in this boot she wears a 13. I took the advice of others and ordered a larger size than normal. I was leary about ordering a size that big, but I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Daisy Boo

customer_reviews.title: Color bleeds badly when wet, staining clothes permanently.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative to Uggs as they are much cheaper, just beware they are not good if they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Colareta

customer_reviews.title: Never seen a shoe disintegrate like this!
customer_reviews.text: The glue came apart on the entire side of one boot after only 2 months of sporadic use. The photo says it all. Save your money because these boots are poor quality!!
customer_reviews.author: lsag

customer_reviews.title: color comes off when moist
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves the style and the comfort of these boots. However, when I used a damp white cloth to wipe the dust off, the pink color came off and stained the cloth. I have since sprayed rainproof treatment on them - hopefully the color will not come off in the rain/snow! This is the third pair of Bearpaw boots I've ever purchased. My first two pairs were chocolate and black and they did not have the problem of color coming off like these ones. Perhaps this only happens with the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: super cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, to wear on the playground, on days that it's not snowy but is cold enough that gym shoes aren't cutting it. She loves them - says they are cozy. I love that they slip on! I would recommend getting some suede spray though, and giving it a good coat before letting your child wear these. I think it gives them a chance to be a bit water-resistant, if even for the season.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these! I followed the instructions and waterproofed them twice and they are great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lea Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good boot but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid boot at good price. I own several pairs and got for my daughters. Size 1 ran small, returned for next size up.
customer_reviews.author: caceemommy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, 7 year old LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots do run small. I bought a size 2 for my 7 year old daughter who wears a 1. I did this based on reviews of other purchasers. I can't compare the quality of these boots to other brands as these are the first shearling boots I've ever purchased, but they feel nice, look great and my kid is ecstatic! I balked at the $$$ price of the "real" brand boots, but at about $50, these are perfect for a growing child.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Aille

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Whatever keeps my daughter happy. Hopefully she doesn't wear them in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Marni Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots but I had to return bc they fit a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Renee7

customer_reviews.title: Good price ,fast shipping  ,comfortable ,made very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my Granddaughters they loved them said they were so soft and comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Francine Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his “slipper boots”
customer_reviews.text: My SON loves these boots. We use them as house slippers in the colder months for our hardwood floors. Unisex in design and color
customer_reviews.author: Mia L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that they don't wear better
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these when she opened them for her birthday in September. The lining was plush and cozy. It is 2 months later, and she noted that the lining did not stay plush but got very matted and flat. Worse than that, there is already a hole in the sole of one of the boots. I would have expected these to last her the season and am diappointed that the soles wore out so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Fits a tad big but works fir comfort. My 8 yr old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for granddaughter and she loved them. Very well made and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Boots are GREAT!! Fit is good, first day is a little snug as it forms to you foot. Day 2 fit perfect. Price is great for a 4 year old to replace every winter and easy on off for little ones running out the door. Has held up to rough wear and tear in Arizona desert and washes. I'm talking about daily walks for a mile or so across wild desert. Goatheads (thorns) do not go all the way through the soles, so pain free walks!!! I totally recommend boots!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5000

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fell apart in just a couple of month
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots but they fell apart so quickly! The seam at the ankle broke and the entire boot became floppy immediately.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Sole came off
customer_reviews.text: Boots were cute and comfortable, but the sole fell off after being worn about 8 times.
customer_reviews.author: M_J

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, warm and super comfy for my 10 year old. The price is more affordable for the same quality as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cozy boots, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my 4 year old nephew, he loves them
customer_reviews.author: MARIANNE F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the shoe fits and looks on my granddaughters.
customer_reviews.author: P. House

customer_reviews.title: Quality not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved these boots, but they didn’t last at all. She only wore them for about a month and the sole started separating from the shoe. Paid too much for a kids shoe for them not to last at least a season. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Size, color, quality-- perfect for my 9 year old granddaughter! She loves them! Price is right, too! We'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter (9 yrs) and she loves them. She wears them everywhere. She tells they are "sooo comfortable". My wife really likes the quality but keep them away from the dog. They make great chew toys. We compared the price to a local retailer and this pair was almost $10 cheaper! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Rubber soles are a plus! Daughter wanted uggs but got these instead for fraction of the price. These are better quality than uggs. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: They seemed really good quality but the sole separated from the shoe on ...
customer_reviews.text: They seemed really good quality but the sole separated from the shoe on the 3rd wearing so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: DebT

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my daughter. She wears them almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She wears them almost everyday and there’s been little to no wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: HowTheTidesRise

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas present for my son and he loved it. it was a little tight but after ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my son and he loved it. it was a little tight but after a wear or two they opened up. I put some Waterproofing spray on them and he uses them when it snows and rains and they haven't fallen apart nor do they smell.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: She needed to size up from an old pair and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cedar S.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says these boots are warm and cozy and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says these boots are warm and cozy and she loves the color. They seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Boys need boots too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and they are perfect! He wears them all the time, they’re warm and a great neutralize
customer_reviews.author: V A L E R I E C

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these. Wears them all the time. ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. Wears them all the time. Have held up well. Bought a size up based on reviews. Initially, fit well, but now a little big after they've been worn in.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: These boots tore apart with a gaping hole in the arch after minimal use in a short period of time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot to keep you warm in winter. Make sure to protect them and they will last all winter!
customer_reviews.author: Inspectrex

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for walking and looking great
customer_reviews.text: Really a great boot. Not really sure about the arch support, I will assume it was good as they seemed to be comfortable all day. They will bleed onto your socks if they get really wet.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's when we went on our ski trip. They were great quality for the price and super comfy and warm for our ski trip. The girls loved them.
customer_reviews.author: CHANNIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Classic boot that keeps feet warm and keeps out snow
customer_reviews.text: Looked for the best price for this boot for two weeks. Store after store. Turns out I just had to look in Amazon. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: She raves on how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves these boots. She raves on how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cozy boots.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my six year old as I can't justify spending the money on a pricier boot when her foot will outgrow them quickly. They are cute boots, fit well and keep her toes warm. She loves them, I love them. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E. Newman

customer_reviews.title: ... and this is the first time that I'm not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product for my daughter many times and this is the first time that I'm not happy with this product. It lost its structure after a few times of her using it. I had to buy her another boot.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10-year old daughter. After reading the reviews I ordered a size 3 for her current shoe size of 1.5. They fit just about right. These boots appear to be well made and substantial. My daughter says they are comfortable and she loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Block

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fine. Size fits
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fine. Size fits. Only thing wrong was that within a week hald the sole came off and was flopping around, but I'm handy so I fixed it. Yay me!
customer_reviews.author: Necrissa

customer_reviews.title: Really nice boots for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and color! My daughter really wanted a pair of BearPaw’s and these didn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: SongBird73

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son got these for Christmas and he was very happy. I like the quality. They feel really durable and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Donelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I needed something warm for my daughter, that we would both like the look of, and these have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Bear paw Emma
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wears these daily, just don't wear as well I think they should, keeps her feet warm
customer_reviews.author: buns949

customer_reviews.title: very good qulaty
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair for my girl. She wore the first pair last winter every day to school. Well made. Unfortunately her feet grew and I got her a bigger pair for this year. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Berarie

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for my daughter for winter. Love the color and nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Jotabler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and price of bearpaws. These fit well and the last! My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Great color so warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We love bearpaw and these boots are especially comfortable and warm for my 5 year olds feet. Beautiful color but it lightens a bit after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: ANLZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair 2 years ago for my granddaughter that's 10 yrs old and they are now wearing out needed a new pair!!!! Very pleased with these boots
customer_reviews.author: GAMMAC

customer_reviews.title: I am usually a ladies size 6. I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a ladies size 6. I ordered these in a girls 5 and they fit perfectly. I would not hesitate to order a girls size again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got those boots for my 9yr old daughter. Since I have the same kind I knew she’ll love it. The boots are cozy and warm. And much more less expensive than other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L

customer_reviews.title: Price is good.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small. Bought it for my kid to wear around the house on cold winter days. price is nice
customer_reviews.author: Karaganda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my daughter! It’s so soft and warm in the inside.
customer_reviews.author: D Park

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots we're very nice well constructed very comfortable. My granddaughter lives them.
customer_reviews.author: rodger wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: They are completely different than the ones I bought two ...
customer_reviews.text: They are completely different than the ones I bought two years ago. Too stiff and too big lining was not as soft. No I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I. White

customer_reviews.title: Priced great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect boots for my 8 year olds growing feet! Great quality and 1/2 the price of other boots!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots but run VERY small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wanting these boots for a while and was so excited when she received them in the mail. She is typically a size 12 so I ordered a 13 to have a little wiggle room. The 13 was tight and had for her to put on. I returned them for a 1. She is very happy. Just note that they run VERY smal.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hendeles

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for my six year old girl who won't wear anything else now. A much less expensive option than ugg boots that she will grow out of by next winter anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Color just like picture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. So she hasn't tried on yet.....but I wanted to say the color Pom Berry is what we ordered and is exactly what we received!! So many people complain about stuff not being the same color. So cute and can't wait for Christmas morning....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sold on Bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable shoe for my daughter. I have purchased Uggs for my older daughter in the past and these shoes are just as durable and comfortable for a 1/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ayanaj T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Bearpaw boots are wonderful! I have no idea why anyone pays more for Uggs?! These are warm, comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Hobgoblin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought as part of a halloween costume (Teen Titans Go, Raven) and, now that the weather has turned cold, my daughter wears them all the time. They're soft, warm, and comfortable. Go great with jeans or a dress.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Terrell

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand as they are priced well and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand as they are priced well and very warm. These were too big, so she will have to wait until probably next year.
customer_reviews.author: onenaughtybrit

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots. They are warm and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. They are warm and cute. My granddaughter loves them. I did give them a protective coating before gifting to ensure great wear.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes 2 sizes larger because they run small. We previously purchased these for my daughter from a store in the mall. We had to go up 2 sizes to get a good fit. Therefore, I already knew not to order these shoes the exact size. Very good to know when ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: love them - just wish she would stop growing
customer_reviews.text: we buy these every year for my daughter. love them - just wish she would stop growing =0
customer_reviews.author: Tarek K. Dhanani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Better price than Uggs. And this is made so much better. The souls don't wear out like uggs And the cord around the sole and upper is covered in suede not cotton which frays and looks shabby after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: J Carto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. We went up a size...lots of fluff inside. Beautiful boot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits small and quality isn't as good as is should be
customer_reviews.text: Fits small and quality isn't as good as is should be. My twins needed them so we got stuck with them.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Emma Youth Mid Calf Boot
product_meta.description:
Suede pull on boot with blended wool shaft.

Bearpaw Footwear is made for comfort with contemporary style. Our footwear is made from quality materials that provide an organic beauty that's wearable year round.
